data.thought: S31|H|S27|Observatory Phenotype E4: 'Ambient Awareness Display'. Always-on notebook streams context to ambient display (second monitor, wall screen, mobile widget). Shows: project health, recent commits, open issues, team activity. Thoughtbox: prioritizes what's attention-worthy, filters noise, highlights anomalies. Observable: glanceable cards, priority indicators, contextual alerts. Use case: team rooms, personal dashboards, manager views. Background awareness w/o active monitoring.
